name: Turtle trials
description:
Help the Turtle Pass through a forest filled with obstacles and trials! 

Turtle trials is a Real-time reaction resource management game, where you manipulate the environment in order to help a turtle pass through, Note that you are not in control of the turtle itself, as such you must act quickly!

made for the 2022 Secret santa game jam, based on a prompt given by the user Kamataya,

Credit:

Game by - Aviv Youker Harel

Music by - Charbomber

Sound effects taken from Zapsplat.com
